metadata.title: Universal Remote Control for Samsung BN59-01220A and All Other Samsung Smart TV Models LCD LED 3D HDTV QLED Smart TV BN59-01199F AA59-00786A BN59-01175N
features: The remote control is Applicable and tested for BN59-01220A And all Samsung Smart TV.
Farther transmitting distance, stable performance. Replaces your damage or old one and covers all the functions of the original remote.
Small and compact size makes this remote control easy to grip and uneasy to slip. Easy to use, NO programming or setting up required.
Goods are note equipped with 2 AAA Batteries. need to buy the batteries separately. Works Well After Putting the Batteries
description: Key Features: Direct Channel Access for Digital TV's. TV Controls Include Power On/Off, Volume Up/Down, Mute and TV Input. Media Playback Controls Include Play/pause, Skip Forward, Fast Forward, Skip Back, Fast Back, and Display. Just a soft touch or Press is enough To Switch to you Favorite Channel. With A Fast Switch Delay 2 Seconds Or less. This Remote Is Very Lightweight, Ergonomic, Does Not Require A Lot of Space And Comfortable To Hold By Hand. No Programming Is Required -- Just Insert the Batteries And It Works. Will last for a very long time with just 2 batteries. Remarks If some buttons do not work, try changing the batteries. This remote does not have a Netflix Specific button.

title: CHUNGHOP Remote Control Compatible with Samsung 4K Smart UHD
BN59-01220D Replacement for Samsung Smart TV Remote
